title: Kherson Braces for Battle as Russian Administration Evacuates
description: Evidence points to both sides preparing for a pitched battle for the southern city, and Ukrainians say hints of a Russian military withdrawal are mere deception.
dc:creator: Marc Santora and Ivan Nechepurenko
media:credit: Bulent Kilic/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: A damaged building in the village of Arkhanhelske, in the Kherson region, on Thursday. The building was formerly occupied by Russian forces.
